pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hybrid Analysis of Population and Trio Data with Knockoff Statistics for FDR Control // Identification of putative causal variants in genome-wide association studies using hybrid analysis of both the trio and population designs. The package implements the method in the paper: Yang, Y., Wang, Q., Wang, C., Buxbaum, J., Ionita-Laza, I. (2024). KnockoffHybrid: A knockoff framework for hybrid analysis of trio and population designs in genome-wide association studies. The American Journal of Human Genetics, in press.
